item.title: 阿根廷央行放宽准备金规则以提高流动性
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政党在关键的中期选举中获胜后，阿根廷放宽了商业银行必须每日上报的存款准备金比例，以逐步提供更多的流动性并恢复贷款。【原文：Argentina loosened the share of reserve requirements that commercial banks must report daily in a bid to gradually provide more liquidity and revive lending after President Javier Milei’s party won a crucial midterm election.】

item.title: Fiserv 唯一的 "熊 "是一位 26 岁的分析师，他打败了华尔街
item.description: 在 Fiserv 公司股票大幅下挫之前，唯一一位对该公司给予卖出评级的分析师表示，几个月前就已经看出端倪。【原文：The lone analyst with a sell rating on Fiserv Inc. ahead of the company’s crushing stock selloff says the writing was on the wall for months.】

item.title: 各州数据显示美国上周初请失业金人数下降
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）对联邦政府停摆期间公布的未经调整的州一级申请数据进行分析后发现，上周美国失业救济金申请人数有所下降。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week, according to a Bloomberg News analysis of unadjusted state-level filings released during the federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 美国安保承包商佩拉顿的贷款人组建新集团，因为停业有可能削弱现金储备
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于人们越来越担心政府长期停摆可能会削弱佩拉顿公司的现金储备，佩拉顿公司的一组第一顺位贷款人已经找到了 Evercore Inc 和 Gibson Dunn & Crutcher。【原文：A group of first-lien lenders to Peraton Corp. have tapped Evercore Inc and Gibson Dunn & Crutcher amid growing concerns that a prolonged government shutdown could dent its cash reserves, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南特朗普品牌高尔夫度假村因土地纠纷受阻
item.description: 在河内郊外举行了华丽的奠基仪式五个月后，特朗普组织耗资 15 亿美元打造的豪华高尔夫度假村揭开了神秘面纱，但由于愤怒的农民对清场计划提出质疑，该度假村所在区域仍然只有香蕉和橘子树。【原文：Five months after a glitzy groundbreaking ceremony just outside of Hanoi, the area where The Trump Organization-branded $1.5 billion luxury golf resort was unveiled remains just fields of banana and orange trees as angry farmers challenge the site’s clearance plans.】

item.title: 关于劳动力市场的几点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 尽管中国市场意外下滑，但苹果销售额仍超出预期
item.description: 苹果公司第四季度营收超过了分析师的预期，尽管其在中国市场的销售额意外下滑，而苹果公司一直在中国奋力东山再起。【原文：Apple Inc.’s fourth-quarter revenue edged past analysts’ estimates despite a surprise sales decline in China, where it’s been struggling to stage a comeback.】

item.title: 播客将目光从音频和 YouTube 转向电视
item.description:
随着线性电视的衰落和播客成为视频明星，音频领域以外的公司正急于获得其节目的许可证

。【原文：

As linear TV declines and podcasters become video stars, companies outside the audio realm are rushing to license their programs

】

item.title: 扎克伯格亿万富豪排名下降两位，元人工智能计划令投资者动摇
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）在彭博亿万富豪指数（Bloomberg Billionaires Index）中的排名跌至第五位，创下近两年来的新低，原因是投资者对 Meta Platforms 公司计划出售 300 亿美元债务感到恐慌，导致该公司股价飙升，而一系列科技财报则动摇了世界首富的行列。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg fell to fifth place on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index — the lowest in nearly two years — as investors spooked by Meta Platforms Inc.’s planned $30 billion debt sale sent the company’s shares spiraling amid a flurry of tech earnings shaking up the ranks of the world’s richest.】

item.title: Netflix 宣布进行 10 对 1 股票分割以惠及员工
item.description: Netflix 公司批准了 10 对 1 的股票分割，以使股价达到参加公司股票期权计划的员工更容易接受的范围。【原文：Netflix Inc. approved a 10-for-1 stock split to bring the share price to a more accessible range for employees who participate in the company’s stock option program.】

item.title: 摩根大通将从 EA 5 亿美元债务费用中分得一杯羹
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）将保留支持电子艺界公司（Electronic Arts Inc.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is set to keep 40% of the fees tied to the $20 billion debt financing backing the take-private of Electronic Arts Inc., disappointing a large group of banks that were keen to get a bigger share of the deal.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 希望从 Ping Identity 债务交易中获得 10 亿美元赔偿
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权投资公司 Thoma Bravo LLC 将以约 10 亿美元的债务支付方式，出让其在智能解决方案公司 Ping Identity Holding Corp.【原文：Private equity firm Thoma Bravo LLC is taking out most of its equity in intelligence solutions company Ping Identity Holding Corp. with a roughly $1 billion debt-funded payout, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Reddit 预计假日季度广告销售强劲
item.description: Reddit 公司预计第四季度销售额将超过分析师预期，这表明其广告业务在上市一年半后将继续保持稳定增长。【原文：Reddit Inc. projected fourth-quarter sales that beat analysts’ expectations, a sign that its advertising business will continue to grow at a steady clip a year-and-a-half after going public.】

item.title: 烟草供应商从 Stifel 获得 6.75 亿美元私人债务交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Stifel Financial Corp. 正在发起并主导为 Tobacco Rag Processors Inc.【原文：Stifel Financial Corp. is launching and leading the sale of a $675 million private credit financing package for Tobacco Rag Processors Inc., which supplies tobacco products to manufacturers, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亚马逊报告云计算部门创 2022 年以来最快增速
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的云计算部门公布了近三年来最强劲的增长率，这让那些担心这家最大的计算能力租赁商正在被竞争对手甩开的投资者感到放心。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s cloud unit posted the strongest growth rate in almost three years, reassuring investors who were concerned that the largest seller of rented computing power was losing ground to rivals.】

item.title: 英特尔洽谈收购人工智能芯片初创公司 SambaNova
item.description: 据知情人士透露，英特尔公司正在就收购人工智能芯片初创公司 SambaNova Systems Inc.【原文：Intel Corp. is in preliminary talks to buy artificial intelligence chip startup SambaNova Systems Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 饮酒习惯的转变让酒类股票损失 8,300 亿美元
item.description: 由于啤酒、葡萄酒和烈酒行业正面临着巨大的变革，在四年多一点的时间里，全球顶级上市啤酒、葡萄酒和烈酒制造商的股价累计下跌了 8300 亿美元。【原文：Shares of the world’s top listed beer, wine and spirits makers have shed a combined $830 billion in a little more than four years as the industry grapples with monumental change.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平关税休战的赢家和输家
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，我们将讨论中美两国在最新贸易协定中的收获--以及为什么时间站在中国一边。【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast, what the US and China gained in the latest trade agreement – and why time is on China’s side.

】

item.title: 千禧年融资 50 亿美元，瞄准私人市场赌注
item.description: 千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）正在募集 50 亿美元的新基金，用于投资私募市场机会，从而将公司的业务范围扩展到其主要从事流动资产交易的核心业务之外。【原文：Millennium Management is raising $5 billion in a new fund to invest in private market opportunities, extending the firm’s reach beyond its core business of trading mostly liquid assets.】

item.title: 特朗普与中国达成的 TikTok 协议 — 我们知道些什么？
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，经过一年多的谈判，中美两国即将 "达成 "一项协议，将社交媒体平台 TikTok 在美国的业务转让给一个新的投资财团。【原文：After more than a year of negotiations, the US and China are nearing the “resolution” of a deal to transfer the US operations of social media platform TikTok to a new investor consortium, according to US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.】

item.title: 流动性担忧加剧，交易员全力追捧美联储基金利差
item.description: 在美国利率期货市场的一个狭小角落，交易商们已经投入了创纪录的资金，押注一旦美联储采取行动抑制货币市场的资金紧张，隔夜贷款利率之间的利差走势。【原文：Traders have been piling in record amounts into a narrow corner of the US interest-rate futures market, betting on spread movements between overnight lending rates in the event the Federal Reserve acts to dampen funding strains in money markets.】

item.title: 微软警告投资者当地反对建立数据中心
item.description: 微软公司警告投资者，其庞大的数据中心计划面临新的风险：地方反弹。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is warning investors about a new risk to its expansive data center plans: local backlash.】

item.title: 人工智能公司 Udio 因环球唱片限制歌曲的协议而激怒用户
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Udio 与环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）签署协议，限制用户使用自己创作的曲目，这引发了用户的愤怒反弹。【原文：Udio, an artificial intelligence startup, triggered an angry backlash from subscribers after signing an agreement with Universal Music Group NV that restricts their use of the tracks they create.】

item.title: Bloom Energy 在股价大涨后寻求 17.5 亿美元的可转换债券
item.description: 布鲁姆能源公司（Bloom Energy Corp. ）正利用其高涨的股价，通过发行零息可转换债券筹集 17.5 亿美元，为未偿还证券再融资。【原文：Bloom Energy Corp. is taking advantage of its high-flying stock price to raise $1.75 billion in a zero-coupon convertible bond to refinance outstanding securities.】

item.title: 英伟达将向人工智能初创公司 Poolside 投资最多 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英伟达公司计划向人工智能公司 Poolside 投资多达 10 亿美元，这笔交易将使这家人工智能初创公司的估值翻两番。【原文：Nvidia Corp. plans to invest as much as $1 billion in the artificial intelligence company Poolside, according to people familiar with the matter — part of a deal that would quadruple the valuation of the AI startup.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼拟削减银行监管部门约 30
item.description: 美联储最高级别的银行警察宣布，计划重组该机构的监督和监管部门，并将该部门的人员缩减约 30%。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s top bank cop announced plans to reorganize the agency’s supervision and regulation division and shrink the unit’s staff by roughly 30%.】

item.title: 根据欧盟立法者的建议，数字欧元可能受到限制
item.description: 欧盟主要立法者表示，只有当私营部门没有提出自己的解决方案来整合该地区支离破碎的支付格局时，才应推出成熟的数字欧元。【原文：A fully-fledged digital euro should only be launched if the private sector doesn’t come up with its own solution to integrate the region’s fractured payments landscape, according to the lead European Union lawmaker on the file.】

item.title: 中国最大金属集团呼吁限制铜产能
item.description: 中国主要金属协会表示，中国应考虑对国内铜、锌、铅产能设置上限，以应对残酷的国内竞争。【原文：China should consider imposing a ceiling on domestic copper, zinc, lead capacity to tackle cutthroat domestic competition, said the country’s main metals association.】

item.title: Globalstar 在出售过程中引起 SpaceX 的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Globalstar 公司正在探索潜在的出售方案，并已与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司以及其他潜在的收购方进行了早期谈判。【原文：Globalstar Inc. is exploring a potential sale and has held early talks with Elon Musk’s SpaceX among other potential suitors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: General Atlantic 主导 20 亿美元的 Shutterfly 私人信贷交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 General Atlantic 为首的私人信用贷款公司正在洽谈向 Shutterfly 提供约 20 亿美元的债务。【原文：Private credit lenders led by General Atlantic are in talks to provide about $2 billion of debt to Shutterfly, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
